				except:

try:
		scriptName = "On Row Click: BoolType Table"
		self.getSibling("LblWarning").meta.visible = False
		Status = self.session.custom.WOOperationStatus
		if Status == str("Assigned").strip() or Status == str("On-Hold").strip():
			selectedColumnName = self.props.selection.selectedColumn
			if str(selectedColumnName) == ("Action").strip():
				self.getSibling("LblWarning").props.text = "Maintenance is not in Progress"
				self.getSibling("LblWarning").meta.visible  = True
			else:
				self.getSibling("LblWarning").props.text = " "
				self.getSibling("LblWarning").meta.visible = False
		else:
			defineKeyColumn = "TaskID"
			selRow=event.row
			selColumn=self.props.selection.selectedColumn
			dtSet=self.props.data

			try:          
				TaskID = dtSet.getValueAt(selRow,"TaskID")
				TaskTypeID = dtSet.getValueAt(selRow,"TaskTypeID")
			except:      
				pass
				
			TaskAttachements = 	MaintenanceOCAPI.GetTaskAttachments(TaskID)
			self.parent.parent.getChild("TblAttachments").props.data  = TaskAttachements

			selectedColumn=self.props.selection.selectedColumn

			if 'OkSelected'==str(self.props.selection.selectedColumn):
				dtSet=self.props.data
				dsselecttion= self.props.selection.data

				for i in dsselecttion:
					selection=i['OkSelected']


				try:
					scriptName = 'PMTC: NOK Checkbox: On Action Performed'
					SelctedRow=self.props.selection.selectedRow
					columnName=selectedColumn	
	
					if str(selection).strip().lower()=='true' or  str(selection).strip().lower()=='1' or  str(selection).strip()=='True':
						selection=False
					else:
						selection=True
								


					messageType = 'UpdateBoolTask'
					system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload = {"columnName":columnName,"selection":selection,"SelctedRow":SelctedRow}, scope = "page")
					selColumn=self.props.selection.selectedColumn	
					selectedRow=self.props.selection.selectedRow
					rowValues=event.value

					defineKeyColumn = "TaskID"
					updatedValue=rowValues['OkSelected']
					if updatedValue==True or updatedValue==1 or str(updatedValue).lower()==str('True').lower():
						updatedValue=0
					else:
						updatedValue=1

					selRow=event.row  
					dtSet=self.props.data
					updateRowResultDs = {selColumn:updatedValue}
					resultpyData = system.dataset.updateRow(dtSet,selRow,updateRowResultDs)  
					ds= system.dataset.toPyDataSet(resultpyData)
					self.props.data=ds
					self.props.selection.selectedColumn= 'TaskDescription'
					self.props.selection.selectedRow = selRow
				except:
					import sys, os
					exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
					lineno = tb.tb_lineno
					errorMessage = "'Exception :: PMTC:: TableTextType: On Column Update CheckBox:"+ str(exc_obj) + "Code Line No: "+ str(lineno)
					system.perspective.print(errorMessage+' || Line No :' + str(lineno))
					Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)
			elif 'Action'==str(self.props.selection.selectedColumn):	
				dtSet=self.props.data
				dsselecttion= self.props.selection.data
				
				for i in dsselecttion:
					selection=i['Action']

				try:
					scriptName = 'PMTC: NOK Checkbox: On Action Performed'
					SelctedRow=self.props.selection.selectedRow
					columnName=selectedColumn	
	
					if str(selection).strip().lower()=='true' or  str(selection).strip().lower()=='1' or  str(selection).strip()=='True':
						selection=False
					else:
						selection=True

					messageType = 'UpdateBoolTask'
					system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType, payload = {"columnName":columnName,"selection":selection,"SelctedRow":SelctedRow}, scope = "page")
					selColumn=self.props.selection.selectedColumn	
					selectedRow=self.props.selection.selectedRow
					rowValues=event.value

					defineKeyColumn = "TaskID"
					updatedValue=rowValues['Action']
					if updatedValue==True or updatedValue==1 or str(updatedValue).lower()==str('True').lower():
						updatedValue=0
					else:
						updatedValue=1

					selRow=event.row  
					dtSet=self.props.data
					updateRowResultDs = {selColumn:updatedValue}
					resultpyData = system.dataset.updateRow(dtSet,selRow,updateRowResultDs)  
					ds= system.dataset.toPyDataSet(resultpyData)
					self.props.data=ds
					self.props.selection.selectedColumn='TaskDescription'
					self.props.selection.selectedRow = selRow
				except:
					import sys, os
					exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
					lineno = tb.tb_lineno
					errorMessage = "'Exception :: PMTC:: TableTextType: On Column Update CheckBox:"+ str(exc_obj) + "Code Line No: "+ str(lineno)
					system.perspective.print(errorMessage+' || Line No :' + str(lineno))
					Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)

	except:
		import sys, os
		exc_type, exc_obj,tb = sys.exc_info()
		lineno = tb.tb_lineno
		errorMessage = "'Exception :: PMTC:: TableTextType: On Row Select:"+ str(exc_obj) + "Code Line No: "+ str(lineno)
		system.perspective.print(errorMessage+' || Line No :' + str(lineno))
		Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)

try:
		scriptName = "RMTC: Consume Table: Message Handler: UpdateConsumeTable"
		greenColor="#00AC00"
		redColor="#FF0000"
		
		dtSet=self.props.data
		selRow=payload['SelctedRow']
		selColumn=payload['columnName']
		
		if selColumn == "ConsumedQty":
			consumeQty= payload['consumeQty']
			updateRowResultDs = {"ConsumedQty":consumeQty}
			
			#Getting existing values from this table for validations
			ConsumedQty = dtSet.getValueAt(selRow,'ConsumedQty')  #It will use to bind Qty which's validation failed
			RequestedQty = dtSet.getValueAt(selRow,"RequestedQty")
			AllocatedQty = dtSet.getValueAt(selRow,"AllocatedQty")
			TotalConsumedQty = dtSet.getValueAt(selRow,"TotalConsumedQty")
			
			DifferenceQty = int(AllocatedQty) - int(TotalConsumedQty)
			
			if int(consumeQty) <= (int(AllocatedQty)):
				if int(consumeQty) <= (int(DifferenceQty)):
					resultpyData = system.dataset.updateRow(dtSet,selRow,updateRowResultDs)
					ds= system.dataset.toPyDataSet(resultpyData)
					self.props.data=ds
					dtSet =self.props.data
					system.perspective.print('dtSet :' + str(dtSet))
					ConsumedQty = dtSet.getValueAt(selRow,"ConsumedQty")
					system.perspective.print('ConsumedQty :' + str(ConsumedQty))
					self.getSibling("Warning Value").meta.visible = False
					self.getSibling("btnSubmitConsume").props.enabled = True
					
				else:
					updatedValue = ConsumedQty
#					self.getSibling("Warning Value").props.textStyle.color = str(redColor)
#					self.getSibling("Warning Value").meta.visible = True
#					self.getSibling("Warning Value").props.text = "The quantity entered is out of limit as per allocated and total consumed quantity"
					MessageText = "Please enter quantity less than total available quantity: "+ str(DifferenceQty)
					system.perspective.openPopup('MessagePopup','Project_MES_Solution/Maint Operator Console_RM/MessageBoxPopup',params={"MessageText": MessageText,"ErrorVisible": True,"SuccessVisible":False},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)

#					self.getSibling("btnSubmitConsume").props.enabled = False
			else:
				updatedValue = ConsumedQty
#				self.getSibling("Warning Value").props.textStyle.color = str(redColor)
#				self.getSibling("Warning Value").meta.visible = True
#				self.getSibling("Warning Value").props.text = "The consume quantity cannot be greater than allocated quanity"
				MessageText =  "The consume quantity cannot be greater than allocated quanity: " + str(AllocatedQty)
				system.perspective.openPopup('MessagePopup','Project_MES_Solution/Maint Operator Console_RM/MessageBoxPopup',params={"MessageText": MessageText,"ErrorVisible": True,"SuccessVisible":False},draggable=False,resizable = False,modal=True,showCloseIcon=False)
		
		elif str(selColumn) == "Comments":
			Comments= payload['Comments']
			updateRowResultDs = {"Comments":Comments}
			resultpyData = system.dataset.updateRow(dtSet,selRow,updateRowResultDs)
			ds= system.dataset.toPyDataSet(resultpyData)
			self.props.data=ds
		else:
			pass
			
	except:
		import sys, os
		errorMessage=scriptName  +' Exception : '+  str(sys.exc_info()[1])
		system.perspective.print('errorMessage :' + str(errorMessage))
		Authentication.exceptionLogger(errorMessage)

			self.getChild("CntTaskAttachments").getChild("TblAttachments").props.data =None
